entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 04:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
